mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reply (reply_text, reply_writer, board_no, account) VALUES (#{replyText}, #{replyWriter}, #{boardNo}, #{account})
mapper.select: select r.reply_no, r.reply_text, r.reply_writer, r.reply_date, r.board_no, r.account, m.profile_img from tbl_reply r left outer join tbl_member m on r.account = m.account WHERE board_no = #{bno} ORDER BY reply_no LIMIT #{p.pageStart}, #{p.amount}
SELECT board_no FROM tbl_reply WHERE reply_no = #{rno}
